text: The Diante do Trono is a Brazilian Christian pop rock band from Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brazil. The band was formed in 1997 in the Lagoinha Church and is known as the main worship ministry in Latin America. The band has sold over 15 million albums and is led by Ana Paula Valad√£o. == References == == Other websites == * Official site Category:1990s establishments in Brazil Category:1990s music groups Category:2000s music groups Category:2010s music groups Category:Belo Horizonte Category:Christian music bands Category:Christian rock bands Category:Musical groups established in 1997 Category:Pop rock bands
title: Diante do Trono
